title: Illustration of French slave trade - illustrate

content.question: The image could best be used to help illustrate which of the following about the transatlantic slave trade?

choices.label: Only a small minority of enslaved Africans were transported directly to mainland North America.
The trade lasted for over 350 years, from the early 1500s to the mid-1800s.
France was one of the top enslaving nations in the Atlantic world.
African kingdoms played an important role in supplying enslaved persons for the transatlantic trade.

content.answer: France was one of the top enslaving nations in the Atlantic world.

topic.text: 2.2: Departure Zones in Africa and the Slave Trade to the United States

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
